tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are visiting premier plus Clinic @ Kodambakkam Dr.Abdul Sir has shown incredible kindness and care towards me. He has been very thorough in explaining the treatment procedures, outlining the possibilities, and providing me with hope for positive outcomes. I am truly grateful for his support and guidance throughout this journey. Thank you very much to him for his compassion and dedication

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
came for a well woman check up at MMM in Feb 2019 and had a battery of tests done. When I was told I was going to see a different doctor, from the one I had seen in previous years to relay the test results, at first I was hesitant. I was used to an elderly, **** ************* ****** ******. A young male? It took some encouragement from the nurses . They were full of praises for him. And so I went in.

 Dr. Abdul is not only obviously very qualified, but also knows how to break down complex info into very simple bits which anyone can understand. 
He explained my results. They had found an echogenic lesion in my endometrium. He explained very simply that I needed a hysterescopy and endometrial biopsy done and went ahead to explain what I needed to do, and where I needed to go. 

After the procedure was done, and results had come in, he gave my husband and I a very clear explanation of the results  and reassured us that it wasn't anything to worry about, but that all I needed was to do check ups. **** ******* ** ******* ** ** ******** ******** ** *** ******* ***** **** ****** ** ** ******* ** ** * ************* 

We were blown away by the Standard of Ethics he maintains, his professionalism and absolute care for me. I can now see why he is so popular. 

Dr. Abdul Basith, sir, God bless you. 
I have recommended you to all my friends and look forward to my next check up with you on 2022.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Basith for my pervasive adenomyosis and he recommended a few tests to see what the real issue was. When results came out, I discovered that I had fibroidal growths in my uterus, and because my symptoms and physical makeup were peculiar, he suggested that I get a hysterectomy done to be relieved of pain and excessive bleeding I was going through every month. A few other doctors had the same opinion and after much hesitation, I had my surgery 9 months back done by Dr. Basith and am extremely happy to say I have been pain free ever since. He has been an absolute godsend because his skillful diagnosis and treatment saved me a lifetime of pain and suffering, so I'll recommend him to anyone looking for expert care, analysis and treatment.
reply_text: thank you so much for the wonderful words.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: All of a sudden getting diagnosed with a disease and knowing at the same moment that a procedure is needed to cure it is very hard to process in. I  was admitted in ER, the way everything was explained to me made me more relaxed. Transperancy with the patient at the same time being aware of the struggle the patient is going through is the two important thing that he always kept throughout the treatment. He not only gives you the confidence but also helps you to pass through hard times easily. * **** ****** ** ********** *** a good human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI),Gynae Problems,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: He is very courteous, friendly and very much approachable any time. He explains the problems and treatments in a patient and elaborate manner. Respects the patient's feelings and emotions. He is a motivator. He is a specialist in andrology and having a great amount of knowledge and experience in IVF treatment procedures. He makes success in all cases. A great personality and a much RELIABLE and TRUSTED person in the field of Gynecology Andrology and a specialist in Infertility treatment in both Male and Female infertility.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I highly recommend Dr.abdul Basith for his treatment to my wife for pregnancy was fabulous ..i got married two years back and my wife not conceived because of pcod problem and I approached many gynaecologist but no solution finally one of my colleagues told about Dr.abdul basith and I visited him.With his treatment I was very satisfied ,after taking relevant tests doctor advised to do follicular analysis ,with in two months my wife got conceived and I am very happy now...I am writing this feedback so that others who are searching of good gynaecologist can approach him and utilise his treatment....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: Hi, he is a different doctor I met in my life who didn't suggest medicine for pcos treatment. He simply said eating habits for burning calories and exercise will overcome pcos. It will go automatically. When I met other doctors for pcos, they always give me a bag full of medicine where I will face other problems. I am very happy with his explanation about the health issues. Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted many gyno for baby. All of them suggested open surgery for fibroid swelling in uterus. Was really scared about large incision in my stomach. But Dr convinced me that it could be done with laparoscopy. Successfully completed surgery and started fertility treatment with him. Surgery was almost pointless. Doctor was calm and comforting and took even small complaints into account. I recommend the doctor for laparoscopy and fertility

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I met Dr. Abdul Basith to find the reason for over bleeding with my scanning report. The doctor has come to his seat right after an emergency operation. The doctor examined the report and in addition discussed with the scanning doctor and patiently explained to us the problems, the significance of why this problem needs to be addressed at the earliest, how it could be handled, how it has to be monitored further. Even later when I had telephonic conversations regarding the procedure and my difficulties he explained the solution and was really flexible for even fixing appointments. Thank you, Doctor
